alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 7:28PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Salt Lake... southwestern Davis...northwestern Utah and northeastern Tooele Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 727 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Delle to Cedar Fort. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, Sandy, Tooele, Grantsville, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Pleasant Grove, Midvale, American Fork, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Alpine, Stansbury Park, Bluffdale and Cedar Fort. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 276 and 296. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 58 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
